name: Misadventures of Mina
description:
Misadventures of Mina is my first visual novel. You meet and go on a hike in the state of Georgia with a woman in red named Mina Gardner. What lies ahead on this misadventure? 

This game contains three endings. It should take you no longer than 15-20 minutes to play through the entire game.

This was just a fun little project for my irl vlog series, The New PhuCat Show. You can check out the devlog coming soon on my YouTube channel! If Let's Plays, irl vlogs, and game development interest you, then feel free to subscribe!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQkGngWYB-DLFl_hWvXHm_w
